title: Every time my team surrenders successfully in ranked
body:
I feel like I am being gang raped every time this happens. i am forced to duo with someone who knows never ever to surrender just so I do not have my time wasted with playing a game and if we are not ahead by 50 kills then surrender.

Surrendering should only ever occur if all 5 players agree to it.

More than 50% of my games have been won while disagreeing to a surrender vote. That is an insane amount of people purposely trying to lose ranked games. Out of 3000 games at least 90% of those go through several surrender votes.

I highly suggest to riot that either this becomes a unanimous vote in order to initiate the surrender or take out surrendering completely. If I had accepted every surrender vote I would have NEGATIVE mmr right now and that shouldn't be possible for someone attempting to play this game professionally.

I have posted on a similar matter to this one regarding my solo queue matchmaking experience and I have got almost no assistance from riot previously except for one riot staff member (Riot Cochese) who was unable to help me due to being in a different area of expertise. I have also submitted a support ticket which gave me absolutely no help whatsoever.

If I do not receive personal help for this then at least look deeper into the surrender vote system.

replies.body:
This seems more like a feature suggestion than a request for help. Personally, I think that the surrender system as it is now is flawed, and very much like the idea of a vote for a vote, as redundant as it seems.

Perhaps head over to [Player Creations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations)?
